name.title: What's your name?
name.error: Name must be between 2 and 20 characters.

birthday.title: What's your birthday?
birthday.subtitle: Only to join circles with people of your age.
birthday.errorTooYoung: You must be at least 13 years old.

phone.title: We need your phone number to make sure you're a real person
phone.subtitle: Only for verification purposes.
phone.error: Please enter a valid phone number.

verificationCode.title: Enter the code you received
verificationCode.invalidCode: The code you entered is invalid.

school.title: Which school are you attending?
school.subtitle: We are only using this information to get you with your peers.
school.details: Be careful not to make a mistake or choose a school that you don't belong to, for safety concerns and for the poolp community.

share.title: Enjoy poolp's full potential : invite your entire promo, class or some peers!

askPermissionNotifications.title: Tap on the notification to receive it for your next circle !

askPermissionNotifications.byEnablingNotifications: By enabling notifications, you will know everyday when :
